page.shortlink: api objects session object save session file to file method
page.description: Retrieves contents previously stored in the current session as a file and copies them to a local file.
page.prototype: Context.Session.SaveSessionFileToFile as L (Key as C, DestinationFile as C)

argument.name: Key
argument.description: The key of the data in the current session.

argument.name: DestinationFile
argument.description: The full path of the file into which the data is to be saved.

page.discussion: Context.Session.SaveSessionFileToFile() retrieves contents previously stored in the current session as a file and copies them to a local file. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.

section.note: The session file must have been created using one of the following methods.:

section.title: Example
section.example: context.session.saveFileToSessionFile( c fileName, c key) context.session.saveDataAsFile( b data, c key)

ref.link: api objects session object format file data url method
